article_title: Closing of Missouri Department of Revenue office leaves residents scrambling for tax help

article_metadata.author:
Susan Redden
sredden@joplinglobe.com

og.description: The closing of a state office that helped senior citizens file for a Missouri tax credit, coupled with tax complications stemming from the federal Affordable Care Act, means area residents
